original_title: Nature's Colors with the World's Greatest Music
overview: The majestic splendor of nature is explored in this visually--and aurally--stunning program. Combining footage of some of Earth's most beautiful locations with a soundtrack consisting of works from Debussy, Beethoven, Mozart, Bach, Vivaldi, Schubert, Bizet, and others, this release is sure to captivate your imagination.
title: Nature's Colors with the World's Greatest Music
